title: Google pixel 3a automatically restart or crash
content:
Phone model: Google pixel 3a
System version: 9
Version number: PQ3B.190605.006
Purchase time: June 2019
Problem Description:
1. When the mobile phone is using the application, or is not used, or charging, or if a call comes in, it will automatically restart.
2, during the charging process, start the phone or open the application is very stuck, and the top position of the phone will be very hot.
3. Audio or video will stop playing automatically when you use Google play music or third-party audio playback software, or open video or audio through a web page.
